author: pozzobon
body:
Core software for Track Trigger simulations proposed for the 6_2_X cycle. Includes: out-of-SimDataFormats new classes, new MC truth association based on TrackingParticles, CBC3 emulation by Ivan, and skeleton for the inclusion of emulation of AM pattern recognition.

.... I just found the request appears for cms-sw:CMSSW_7_0_X. I confirm that I want these files to be put in the 6_2_X cycle...
title: TrackTrigger_NP_20131025
